Hi Alena,

Thanks for flagging.

Confirming we've completed the following updates:
  1. Product Disclosure Statement (PDS) and Financial Services Guide (FSG) is now working
  2. All policy documents now open in a new tab for consistency

Let us know if there’s anything else you’d like adjusted.

full_threads.body: @ricaR Can you help me with this one? we need the links to open on a new tab

Hi Joel,

Thank you for jumping on this quickly. I did notice a few other things sorry.

There is inconsistency in the docs opening, some open in a new tab and others in the same page. For consistency and ideal customer journey can we please have all policy documents open in a new tab. In addition, the following links are still not working:



Let us know if you can restore the original link and if not, we will provide you with a file.

Thank you

Kind regards,

Alena Goryunova

Head of Growth & Partnerships

Hi Simon,

I hope you’re doing well.

Just jumping in on behalf of Andy to provide an update.

We’ve started looking into the issue, and it appears the broken links are due to the removal of the user account "vivean." When the account was deleted, the associated media uploads were also removed. Since the files weren’t reassigned to another user beforehand, they’ve become unavailable—likely causing the missing documents on the legal page.

If there haven’t been any significant recent changes to the site, our recommendation would be to restore the site from a recent backup. Once restored, we can cleanly remove the necessary user accounts and reassign their content to an active user to prevent similar issues moving forward.

Please let us know if this approach works for you. Alternatively, if you'd prefer to send through the affected documents, we can manually re-upload and relink them. Just a heads-up—other pages may also be affected, not just the legal page.

@joel - I've done half of this, can you fix the remaining ones and figure out what happened?
